channel.title: C5shih on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in C5shih on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Dr. Chung-You (Gilbert) Shih
item.description: Chung-You (Gilbert) did his PhD in the QITI group (2019-23), working on individual optical addressing of trapped ions. Previously, he did his MSc research on holographic beam shaping for quantum simulation in the same group.
